09:53:57</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
var tx = inputs.tx
var token = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_token') token.get(tx.token)
var account = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_account') account.get(tx.account)
var cmd = 'cd ' + gs.getProperty('x_snc_hspoke.hcli_home') + ' && node hcli token associate'
if (tx.token) { cmd = cmd + ' --tokenid ' + token.token_id } if (tx.account) { cmd = cmd + ' --accountid ' + account.account_id }
k = tx.sign_with.toString().split(',')
for (i = 0; i < k.length; i++) { kk = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_key') kk.get(k[i]) cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + kk.public_key }
outputs.cmd = cmd
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" query="id=22e4508d87c24510481887b60cbb352c"/><sys_element_mapping action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><field>tx</field><id>22e4508d87c24510481887b60cbb352c</id><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-03 09:53:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>a2e4508d87c24510481887b60cbb3543</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-03 09:53:57</sys_updated_on><table>var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_input_22e4508d87c24510481887b60cbb352c</table><value>{{action.tx}}</value></sys_element_mapping><sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" query="table=var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_output_22e4508d87c24510481887b60cbb352c^id=22e4508d87c24510481887b60cbb352c"/><sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" query="table=var__m_sys_flow_step_definition_input_106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7^id=22e4508d87c24510481887b60cbb352c"/><sys_hub_step_ext_input action="delete_multiple" query="model=22e4508d87c24510481887b60cbb352c^sys_idNOT INeae4508d87c24510481887b60cbb352f"/><sys_hub_step_ext_input action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes>element_mapping_provider=com.glide.flow_design.action.data.FlowDesignVariableMapper,uiType=reference,uiTypeLabel=Reference</attributes><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

var tx = inputs.tx; var stdout = tx.output;
try { output = JSON.parse(stdout)
tx.transaction_id = output.resp.transactionId tx.transaction_hash = output.resp.transactionHash tx.transaction_fee = output.record.transactionFee
if (output.receipt.status == 'SUCCESS') { tx.status = 'completed' tx.hedera_status = output.receipt.status } else { throw Error("Hedera status is not success") }
} catch (e) { tx.out_parsing_log = e.toString() tx.hedera_status = output.error.status tx.status = 'failed' } finally { tx.update(); }

13:12:39</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
var tx = inputs.tx; var stdout = tx.output;
try { output = JSON.parse(stdout)
tx.transaction_id = output.resp.transactionId tx.transaction_hash = output.resp.transactionHash tx.transaction_fee = output.record.transactionFee
if (output.receipt.status == 'SUCCESS') { tx.status = 'completed' tx.hedera_status = output.receipt.status } else { throw Error("Hedera status is not success") }
} catch (e) { tx.out_parsing_log = e.toString() tx.hedera_status = output.error.status tx.status = 'failed' } finally { tx.update(); }
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" query="id=bea5d88d87c24510481887b60cbb3561"/><sys_element_mapping action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><field>stdout</field><id>bea5d88d87c24510481887b60cbb3561</id><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-03 09:57:15</sys_created_on><sys_id>4ba5d88d87c24510481887b60cbb3575</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-03 09:57:15</sys_updated_on><table>var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_input_bea5d88d87c24510481887b60cbb3561</table><value>{{step[6119ac06-f83e-4eae-a688-d162364b6b11].stdout}}</value></sys_element_mapping><sys_element_mapping action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><field>tx</field><id>bea5d88d87c24510481887b60cbb3561</id><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-03 09:57:15</sys_created_on><sys_id>0fa5d88d87c24510481887b60cbb3575</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-03 09:57:15</sys_updated_on><table>var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_input_bea5d88d87c24510481887b60cbb3561</table><value>{{action.tx}}</value></sys_element_mapping><sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" query="table=var__m_sys_flow_step_definition_input_106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7^id=bea5d88d87c24510481887b60cbb3561"/><sys_hub_step_ext_input action="delete_multiple" query="model=bea5d88d87c24510481887b60cbb3561^sys_idNOT IN03a5d88d87c24510481887b60cbb3565"/><sys_hub_step_ext_input action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes>element_mapping_provider=com.glide.flow_design.action.data.FlowDesignVariableMapper,uiType=reference,uiTypeLabel=Reference</attributes><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

09:57:15</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
var tx = inputs.tx
var token = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_token') token.get(tx.token)
var account = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_account') account.get(tx.account)
var cmd = 'cd ' + gs.getProperty('x_snc_hspoke.hcli_home') + ' && node hcli token associate'
if (tx.token) { cmd = cmd + ' --tokenid ' + token.token_id } if (tx.account) { cmd = cmd + ' --accountid ' + account.account_id }
k = tx.sign_with.toString().split(',')
for (i = 0; i < k.length; i++) { kk = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_key') kk.get(k[i]) cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + kk.public_key }
outputs.cmd = cmd
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value
